ACT
151
International will
A will, regardless of the place where it was drawn up, where the estate is located, and the testator's citizenship, residence or place of residence, is valid in terms of form if it was drawn up in accordance with the provisions of Articles 152 to 166 of this Act.
The invalidity of a will as an international will does not affect its validity as some other will, as far as form is concerned.
